HomePage.title: Hi, my name is Hector Zea, this is my personal portfolio, im a software enginer focused in building web applications.
HomePage.about: Hector Zea. Built with Next.js, Shadcn and Tailwind CSS.

innovation.description: Tengo amplia experiencia y conocimientos en tecnologías frontend modernas como React, Angular, TypeScript y Redux, lo que me permite desarrollar aplicaciones web eficientes y escalables.

curious.description: Siempre me apasiona aprender nuevas tecnologías y metodologías, lo que me permite adaptarme rápidamente a diferentes entornos de trabajo y aportar soluciones innovadoras a los desafíos que enfrento.

deliver.description: Tengo siempre la motivación de entregar productos de alta calidad que cumplan con los requisitos del cliente y superen sus expectativas, asegurando que cada proyecto se complete a tiempo y dentro del presupuesto.

hero.main: Building the web and technology with curiosity, innovation, and quality
hero.subtitle: I focus on software development, tackling intelligent solutions to complex problems with curiosity, quality, and great added value.

about.title: About me
about.text_1: My curiosity and passion for the world of computer science led me to web development and the creation of high-quality, scalable solutions focused on user experiences. My work combines good development practices that ensure great product quality with a user-centric approach, leveraging cutting-edge technologies.
about.text_2: Since the beginning of my career, I have honed my skills in web development through multiple small to large-scale projects, creating and improving functionalities. From my beginnings, I maintained my curiosity for JavaScript, being my favorite language and one that gets better every day with TypeScript.
about.text_3: My technological preferences start with React applications, mostly with Next.js, Redux Toolkit, and TypeScript, emphasizing unit, integration, and UI testing, as well as effective application monitoring with Sentry, ensuring continuous quality delivery.
about.text_4: I have experience connecting software components through the creation, maintenance, and monitoring (Grafana, Prometheus) of JavaScript APIs built in Node.js and using Docker for their scalability.
about.text_5: My experience in diverse development environments, from startups to highly established companies, has given me the expertise to develop products from small to large scale, with passion and curiosity for improving every piece of code.

experience.title: Experience
experience.friday_insurance_description: Development of new functionalities and maintenance of SPA applications (self-service portal & claim creation).
experience.eventbrite_description: Improve and maintain global event creation SPAs.
experience.camonapp_description: Development of SPA to monitor experience creation, API maintenance.
experience.inclusion_cloud_description: Development and maintenance of internal SPAs using React, SAP Cloud Platform, and UI5.

projects.title: Projects
projects.task_generator_description: A simple task generator using the best practices of redux toolkit + jest
projects.job_lint_description: A job linting tool that helps to filter job description using an API endpoint with AI and return just the useful details
projects.hearthstone_card_search_description: Simple card search for Hearthstone Game using Hearthstone JSON API

contact.title: Contact
contact.subtitle: Let's work together
contact.description: I'm interested in hearing about and participating in innovative projects and opportunities. If you wish to contact me, feel free to reach out on my social media / professional channels.
contact.about: Hector Zea. Built with Next.js, Shadcn and Tailwind CSS.

ProfileLayout.title: Hector Zea
ProfileLayout.description: I like to build things with code. Im a software engineer based in Berlin, Germany.

path1.title: Pruebas unitarias y de integración
path1.description: Implementé pruebas unitarias y de integración utilizando Jest y React Testing Library para asegurar la funcionalidad y estabilidad del código, logrando una cobertura de pruebas del 85%.
